field.name: orientation
field.label: Orientation
field.description: orientation of the tabs for the vertical and horizontal layout

field.name: orientationAlign
field.label: Buttons Align
field.description: align of the tabs buttons, left and right positions for the vertical lyaout, top and bottom for the horizontal layout

field.name: tabWidth
field.label: Tabs Width
field.description: width of the tabs navigation area

field.name: verticalHeight
field.label: Tabs Height
field.description: height of the tabs navigation area

field.name: tabsLoop
field.label: Loop
field.description: Loop back to first tab at the end of sliding

field.name: tabsScroll
field.label: Mouse Wheel
field.description: this option enable scrolling of the tab buttons by mouse wheel

field.name: buttonsFunction
field.label: Scroll Buttons Action
field.description: specify if the navigation buttons should click or slide through the tabs. In the case of the slide when you click on navigation arrows then tabs buttons slider through the list. In the case of click after every click it's gonna change active tab

field.name: touchSupport
field.label: Touch Support
field.description: enable touchscreen support for the tabs and content

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: height of the general tabs panel

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: width of the general tabs panel

field.name: content_source
field.label: Load Content From
field.description: In the case if you select Content Articles option you'll see on top 3 content configuration tabs: Content Options, Content Ordering, Display Options where you'll be able to select , sort group and order content for loding. In the case of Modules value you'll be able to select which exactly modules to load as content source, in the field below.

field.name: module_type_out
field.label: Module Style
field.description: leave this field is empty if you don't know how to use this option.

field.name: titleintab
field.label: Labels of the Tabs
field.description: Tabs could have 3 different ways to define labels. Article Title - inlables you'll see titles of the loaded to the tabs articles; Index - auto-generated index with template where you can specify some custom text with addition of the auto incremented index; Custom Label - where you can customize label the way you wish;

field.name: custom_label
field.label: Custom Labels
field.description: Here you can define custom label for every tab. Please enter each label on a new line.

field.name: tab_template
field.label: Tab Label Template
field.description: Here youcan define template for indexed tabs labels. For example in the case if you specify here value TabsLabel#, then in result you'll see such labels on tabs: TabsLabel1, TabsLabel2, TabsLabel3... and etc.

field.name: tab_title_length
field.label: Length of the Tabs label
field.description: Length of the tabs labels in symbols. If you have some long labels, but don't wanna customize them, then you can here specify limit for the length of the labels. For example if value here 10, then labels which longer then 10 symbols will be cut off till 10.

field.name: select_default
field.label: Default Tab
field.description: Here you can define id of the default tab. Defined tab will be active when page with tabs will be loaded. For exampel you have tabs with 4 articles: Article1, Article2, Article3 and Article4. In the case if value for this option will be 3, then active tab will with Article3.

field.name: filteringspacer_cd1
field.label: In the case if you using slider plugin multitag mode, then content settings from this tab do not work.

field.name: show_front
field.label: Featured Articles
field.description: Select to Show, Hide or Only display Featured Articles

field.name: count
field.label: Count
field.description: The number of items to display. The default value of 0 will display all articles.

field.name: category_filtering_type
field.label: Category Filtering Type
field.description: Select Inclusive to include Selected Categories, Exclusive to Exclude Selected Categories

field.name: catid
field.label: Category
field.description: Please select one or more categoires

field.name: show_child_category_articles
field.label: Child Category Articles
field.description: Include or Exclude Articles from Child Categories.

field.name: levels
field.label: Category Depth
field.description: The number of child category levels to return

field.name: author_filtering_type
field.label: Author Filtering Type
field.description: Select Inclusive to Include the Selected Authors, Exclusive to Exclude the Selected Authors.

field.name: created_by
field.label: Authors
field.description: Select one or more authors from the list below.
field.query: select id, name, username from #__users where id IN (select distinct(created_by) from #__content) order by name ASC

field.name: author_alias_filtering_type
field.label: Author Alias Filtering Type
field.description: Select Inclusive to Include the Selected Author Aliases, Exclusive to Exclude the Selected Author Aliases.

field.name: created_by_alias
field.label: Author Aliases
field.description: Select one or more author aliases from the list below.
field.query: select distinct(created_by_alias) from #__content where created_by_alias != '' order by created_by_alias ASC

field.name: id_alias_filtering_type
field.label: Article IDs Filtering Type
field.description: Select Inclusive to Include the Selected Article IDs, Exclusive to Exclude the Selected Article IDs.

field.name: excluded_articles
field.label: Article IDs
field.description: Please enter each Article ID on a new line.

field.name: date_filtering
field.label: Date Filtering
field.description: Select Date Filtering Type.

field.name: date_field
field.label: Date Range Field
field.description: Select which date field you want the date range to be applied to.

field.name: start_date_range
field.label: Start Date Range
field.description: If Date Range is selected above, please enter a Starting Date.

field.name: end_date_range
field.label: To Date
field.description: If Date Range is selected above, please enter an End Date.

field.name: relative_date
field.label: Relative Date
field.description: If Relative Date is selected above, please enter in a numeric day value. Results will be retrieved relative to the current date and the value you enter.

field.name: filteringspacer_co1
field.label: In the case if you using slider plugin multitag mode, then content settings from this tab do not work.

field.name: article_ordering
field.label: Article Field to Order By
field.description: Select which field you would like Articles to be ordered by.

field.name: article_ordering_direction
field.label: Ordering Direction
field.description: Select the direction you would like Articles to be ordered by.

field.name: article_grouping
field.label: Article Grouping
field.description: Select how you would like the articles to be grouped.

field.name: article_grouping_direction
field.label: Grouping Direction
field.description: Select the direction you would like the Article Groupings to be ordered by.

field.name: month_year_format
field.label: Month and Year Display Format
field.description: Please enter in a valid date format. See: http://php.net/date for formatting information.

field.name: filteringspacer_do1
field.label: In the case if you using slider plugin multitag mode, then content settings from this tab do not work.

field.name: show_introtext
field.label: Show Text
field.description: Select Show if you would like the text to be displayed.

field.name: text_limit
field.label: Text Limit
field.description: Please enter in a numeric character limit value. The introtext will be trimmed to the number of characters you enter. In the case of 0 value, it will show all symbols.

field.name: enable_template
field.label: Template
field.description: Turn on/off template for slides.

field.name: pendingWrap
field.label: Tabs Padding
field.description: general padding for the tabs panel. Here you can define paddings in pixels for the left, right, top and bottom sides

field.name: pendingInner
field.label: Tabs Inner Padding
field.description: it's internal padding velues inside of the general tabs content panel. Here you can define paddings in pixels for the left, right, top and bottom sides

field.name: background
field.label: Background color
field.description: background color of the general tabs content panel

field.name: border
field.label: Border
field.description: border of the the general tabs content panel in pixels

field.name: tabRadius
field.label: Radius
field.description: radius for the corners of the tabs navigation buttons and tabs content panel

field.name: tabOut
field.label: Tabs Out
field.description: this option make you able to shift navigation tabs buttons from the general tabs panel

field.name: pendingButton
field.label: Tabs Buttons Padding
field.description: paddings for the tabs navigation buttons in pixels

field.name: tabColorSet
field.label: Color
field.description: here you can define title text color for the three stage of the navigation buttons. General color, for active and hovered buttons

field.name: tabBgColorSet
field.label: Background Color
field.description: here you can define background color for the three stage of the navigation buttons. General color, for active and hovered buttons

field.name: fontTabs
field.label: Font
field.description: here you can define font settings for the navigation buttons titles

field.name: tabHeight
field.label: Tabs Height
field.description: height value for the tabs navigation buttons in pixels

field.name: nextIcon
field.label: Next
field.description: select icon for the next scroll button

field.name: prevIcon
field.label: Prev
field.description: select icon for the prev scroll button

field.name: navButColorSet
field.label: Color
field.description: here you can define color for the three stage of the scroll buttons. General color, for active and hovered buttons

field.name: navBgColorSet
field.label: Background Color
field.description: here you can define background color for the three stage of the scroll buttons. General color, for active and hovered buttons

field.name: navButWidth
field.label: Button Width
field.description: width value for the scroll buttons in pixels

field.name: contentAnim
field.label: Animation Mode
field.description: here you can select one of the general animation modes: fade, fadeOutIn, Horizontal for the horizontal sliding, Vertical for the vertical sliding

field.name: contentAnimSpeed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: speed of the animation in milliseconds

field.name: contentEasing
field.label: Effect
field.description: here you can select animation effect, for content animation

field.name: autoplay
field.label: Timer
field.description: This option enable/disable auto image change mode

field.name: autoplayInterval
field.label: Timer delay
field.description: here you can specify time for slide change in milliseconds. For example of you define here 5000 value then every images will change after 5 seconds.

field.name: autoplayClickStop
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: enable or disable auto playing

field.name: navAnimation
field.label: Navigation Animation
field.description: separate animation effects for the navigatoin buttons for the case if width of the tabs more then general tabs width this navigation tabs scrolling with separate effect

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre text
field.description: text before slider, you can use HTML tags here

field.name: posttext
field.label: Post text
field.description: text after slider, you can use HTML tags here

field.name: tabsShowHash
field.label: Show Hash
field.description: this option show or hide hash tags, to avoid conflicts of the page loading in some cases

field.name: urlLinking
field.label: External Link
field.description: here you can disable ability to create external links to the particular tab, in the case if this fucnction not needed

field.name: workScript
field.label: Loading order
field.description: in the case of Before value script loading before another resources, After - script loading after all resources load
